replies.body:

Fill me in!

well my normal client (with the shop,profile,and such.) works beautifully. but as soon as i open up a game after champ select, the screen stays black and doesn't load at all. i have no firewall. Ive re installed it twice. I've repaired the client like 4 times. i just don't know what to do anymore..

Hmmm...definitely sounds like there may be an issue where your computer isn't able to connect to the individual game server, which is why the screen stays black instead of loading up all the champions.  In an effort to rule this out as a possible root cause, make sure to complete all of the steps in our [Connection Issues Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues)!  It has some of the most common solutions that should resolve this issue.

Your ISP's DNS server returns IP addresses even for domain names which should not resolve. Instead of an error, the DNS server returns an address of 92.242.140.2, which resolves to unallocated.barefruit.co.uk. You can inspect the resulting HTML content here.

There are several possible explanations for this behavior. The most likely cause is that the ISP is attempting to profit from customer's typos by presenting advertisements in response to bad requests, but it could also be due to an error or misconfiguration in the DNS server.

The big problem with this behavior is that it can potentially break any network application which relies on DNS properly returning an error when a name does not exist.

It sounds like you ran some tests to help figure out how your connection is doing.  Were you able to complete the steps found in the guide however?  I know there are a lot of steps in that guide, but they are crucial in hopefully resolving this.

Let me know if you've tried them all with no luck!
